content: type=decision spill logs to a single SQLite database shared across all tools. Ea
type=note Spill provides three severity levels: info, warn, error. There is no d
type=error Spill SQLite writes blocked under high concurrency when multiple tool
type=correction Originally logged full entry content in spill on every retrieval
type=decision Commit messages use a tool-name prefix followed by a colon: crib:
type=note Log entries include the tool name as a structured field, not embedded
type=note Log rotation is manual: when the database exceeds a size threshold, ar
type=note When crib logs a retrieval, it records which channels returned results
type=decision Each tool repo uses a single main branch with no feature branches.
type=note Rebasing is preferred over merge commits for keeping history linear. I
